name: Win Condition
_source: s;Simon;Thankfully, this ship seems to be quite a big larger.|And nicer, frankly.
s;Rodger;Ya can't take a man's child and give him a new one.|Just not how this works.
s;Yusna;Everyone remaining below deck has surrendered.|Thankfully, there's no more need for bloodshed.
s;Rodger;Then this is done.|Somehow, you kids cleared the seas.
s;Yusna;How long, do you think, until new pirates arrive?
s;Rodger;Hah, straight for the throat.|A year. Maybe two.
s;Simon;That's all the peace we've bought?|Two years without raiding?
s;Yusna;Violence can only prevent so much violence.|Killing every pirate we find can only do so much.
s;Simon;Then... what do we do?|Just look away from the piracy we find?
s;Yusna;Not at all, but... well, that's a long conversation.
s;Rodger;Then save it.{w} Let me mourn, then I'll sail ya back.
s;Simon;I understand.{w} Thank you for your help, Rodger.
